entry.title: Monday night: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 5.
entry.summary: Snow with risk of freezing drizzle. Amount 5 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 5. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 10:41 PM EST Monday 27 February 2023
